category.name: wcf.acp.leaderGroup
category.item: Select the groups, which members are to be group leaders. Group leaders, who were inserted above, will be deleted.
Select one oder more groups to define group leaders. Deselect all groups to delete existing group leaders.
Multiple items can be selected by holding the “Ctrl/Shift” key (Windows) or “Command” (Mac OS) key and clicking on the desired items.
